title: CodeTaskFactory should auto-update MSBuild-version-specific assembly references.
body:
From an ancient email from @sarajoiner I just happened to run across:

> There should be a “magical” redirect in MSBuild 14 that detects instances of “Microsoft.Build.Tasks.v4.0” and “Microsoft.Build.Tasks.v12.0” in CodeTaskFactory statements and redirects them to “Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Core” (which was named that precisely so that we wouldn’t have to deal with version number renames every release).

nodes.body: Team triage: good idea but we don't think we'll ever get to it.
